code: import React from'react';import ProductList from'./components/ProductList';import ProductForm from'./components/ProductForm';import useProductList from'./hooks/useProductList';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";require('dotenv').config();const dbHost=process.env.DB_HOST;const dbPort=process.env.DB_PORT;const dbName=process.env.DB_NAME;const dbUser=process.env.DB_USER;const apiKey=process.env.API_KEY;console.log("Connecting to database at ".concat(dbHost,":").concat(dbPort,"/").concat(dbName," with user ").concat(dbUser));console.log("API Key: ".concat(apiKey));function App(){const{loading,error,nameFilter,maxPriceFilter,sortOrder,filteredAndSortedProducts,deletingProductId,setNameFilter,handleMaxPriceChange,setSortOrder,handleProductAdded,handleDeleteProduct,fetchProducts}=useProductList();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Gestion des Produits"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductForm,{onProductAdded:handleProductAdded}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductList,{products:filteredAndSortedProducts,loading:loading,error:error,nameFilter:nameFilter,maxPriceFilter:maxPriceFilter,sortOrder:sortOrder,deletingProductId:deletingProductId,onDeleteProduct:handleDeleteProduct,onNameFilterChange:setNameFilter,onMaxPriceFilterChange:handleMaxPriceChange,onSortOrderChange:setSortOrder,onRefresh:fetchProducts})]});}export default App;
